title: The global unique ID
description: With this structure every object is unique and when it is shared with other organizations it can be identified as coming from a specific organization.

organisation.title: The name of the organisation
organisation.description: This can be a name or number uniquely identifying the organisation that issues this number. For example 'RAINFOREST-ALLIANCE' when they issued the identifier or 'BURUNDI' when it is a national ID.

identifier.title: The identifier issued by the organisation.
identifier.description: The identifier issued by the organisation. Can be the Chamber of Commerce number or other number or string known by the organisation.

timestamp.title: The creation timestamp. [YYYY-MM-DD]
timestamp.description: The timestamp when this identifier was created.
